title: The Journal of Nervous and Mental Disease
aka: The Chicago Journal of Nervous and Mental Disease

contents.note: Official journal online contents (with full text available usually for a fee)

renewed-contributions.title: Epilepsy and congenital syphilis
renewed-contributions.note: Cited in a 1966 renewal, but not found in the online table of contents for the specified issue.  Karl and William Menninger did publish a paper with that title in 2 parts in the May and June 1932 issues, but a 1966 renewal would be too late to cover that.
